mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts ( title, content, summary, cover_url, status, user_id, category_id, allow_comments, is_public, is_pinned, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{summary}, #{coverUrl}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{allowComments}, #{isPublic}, #{isPinned}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, summary = #{summary}, cover_url = #{coverUrl}, status = #{status}, category_id = #{categoryId}, allow_comments = #{allowComments}, is_public = #{isPublic}, is_pinned = #{isPinned}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM posts WHERE status = 'published' ORDER BY created_at DESC
